mapper.select: select c.fund_code, c.fund_name, e.type, e.total_asset, e.stock_rate, e.bond_rate, e.money_rate, e.etc_rate, e.present_price, e.one_month_rate, e.three_month_rate, e.six_month_rate, e.one_year_rate, e.commission, e.reg_date from CM_FUND_CODE c, cm_product_fund e where c.fund_name = e.fund_name
mapper.insert: insert into CM_FUND_RATIO(FUND_RATIO_NO, FUND_CODE, FUND_NAME, TYPE, THREE_MONTH_RATE, SIX_MONTH_RATE, ONE_YEAR_RATE, TWO_YEAR_RATE, THREE_YEAR_RATE, FIVE_YEAR_RATE, AVG_THREE_MONTH_RATE, AVG_SIX_MONTH_RATE, AVG_ONE_YEAR_RATE, AVG_TWO_YEAR_RATE, AVG_THREE_YEAR_RATE, AVG_FIVE_YEAR_RATE) values(FUND_RATIO_SEQ.nextval, #{fund_code}, #{fund_name}, #{type}, #{three_month_rate}, #{six_month_rate}, #{one_year_rate}, #{two_year_rate}, #{three_year_rate}, #{five_year_rate}, #{avg_three_month_rate}, #{avg_six_month_rate}, #{avg_one_year_rate}, #{avg_two_year_rate}, #{avg_three_year_rate}, #{avg_five_year_rate})
mapper.select: select DISTINCT r.fund_code, f.FUND_COMPANY, f.fund_name, f.type, f.total_asset, f.PRESENT_PRICE, f.ONE_MONTH_RATE, f.THREE_MONTH_RATE, f.SIX_MONTH_RATE, f.ONE_YEAR_RATE, r.type as investment_index, r.THREE_MONTH_RATE as index_THREE_MONTH_RATE, r.SIX_MONTH_RATE as index_SIX_MONTH_RATE, r.ONE_YEAR_RATE as index_ONE_YEAR_RATE, r.TWO_YEAR_RATE as index_TWO_YEAR_RATE, r.FIVE_YEAR_RATE as index_FIVE_YEAR_RATE, r.AVG_THREE_MONTH_RATE, r.AVG_SIX_MONTH_RATE, r.AVG_ONE_YEAR_RATE, r.AVG_TWO_YEAR_RATE, r.AVG_THREE_YEAR_RATE, r.AVG_FIVE_YEAR_RATE from CM_PRODUCT_FUND f, CM_FUND_RATIO r where (((select investment_type from cm_member where id=#{member_id})=1 and r.fund_name = f.fund_name and f.type in ('매우낮은위험')) or ((select investment_type from cm_member where id=#{member_id})=2 and r.fund_name = f.fund_name and f.type in ('매우낮은위험', '낮은위험')) or ((select investment_type from cm_member where id=#{member_id})=3 and r.fund_name = f.fund_name and f.type in ('매우낮은위험', '낮은위험', '보통위험')) or ((select investment_type from cm_member where id=#{member_id})=4 and r.fund_name = f.fund_name and f.type in ('매우낮은위험', '낮은위험', '보통위험', '다소높은위험')) or ((select investment_type from cm_member where id=#{member_id})=5 and r.fund_name = f.fund_name and f.type in ('매우낮은위험', '낮은위험', '보통위험', '다소높은위험', '높은위험', '매우높은위험'))) and r.type in (#{sd}, #{sr}, #{bm}, #{te}, #{ja}, #{ir}) order by ONE_MONTH_RATE desc
